::Autofire::

Autofire nods, cursing the Quintesson internally. If that bot wasn't 
there, Autofire could have gotten his chip in. No matter, though. The 
chip was a precaution, and precautions wern't always crucial.

"Allright," he says, motioning to a table. "Lay down."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The Quintesson murmurs something to himself, obviously interested in
> Autofire, when Megatron walks in. "All right Autofire, see if the 
chips
> Galvatron inserted into me is still there. If it is, take it out." 
he
> asked, he then looked at the Quintesson, "YOu can help him".
> 
> The Quintesson breaks out of his thought, "Yes Megatron" it says, 
without
> emotion.
